name: XKCD Transcript For Dark Background
description: Please note that this is a slight color modified version of this style (http://userstyles.org/styles/84466/xkcd-show-transcript) and is meant to be used with this style (http://userstyles.org/styles/22251/xkcd-dark-simple).
additional_info:
- Transcript text color changed to ensure readability on dark background
- Transcript background color changed to match dark background

Thanks to myf (http://userstyles.org/users/347) for creating the original Style :)
